about_the_game:
FemQuest is a playful approach focused on getting girls and young women interested in programming. Customize your character and play alone or with friends to save the town! Gather resources and solve puzzles in a block-based programming environment, all while picking up a wide range of programming concepts on the side.

Story

A coastal town is in turmoil, as a mysterious creature called Skadi is wreaking havoc. According to rumors it escaped from Professor Improba's laboratory. In a laboratory accident, it allegedly became malignant and increasingly powerful, and was finally able to break out and imprison Prof. Improba.

It is now up to you and your friends to save the town from chaos! Luckily you have one more ace up your sleeves: The clever fox Sapientia managed just in time to flee from Skadi, and she can support you to restore order in the town. Gather resources, rebuild damaged buildings, repair the power generator, and finally free Prof. Improba to create an antidote to revert Skadi's curse.

Multiplayer

FemQuest supports multiplayer functionality for people in the same Local Area Network (LAN). You and your friends can all work together to gather resources and complete quests to save the town. The session host can play the role of the fox Sapientia, who guides the other players.

Features

  • Singleplayer and LAN Multiplayer: Play alone or with friends.

  • Character customization: Choose between many different clothes, hairstyles, and more!

  • A captivating story, told in comics and dialogues.

  • Three game chapters, each with unique dialogues and puzzles.

  • Explore a picturesque coastal town and talk to its inhabitants.

  • Gather resources and solve programming puzzles to complete quests.

  • A block-based programming environment: Drag and drop blocks in an intuitive way.

  • 10 questlines with over 40 Sub-Quests, encouraging you to get creative and think like an engineer while building your own solutions to problems!

  • Learn programming concepts, such as if-else statements, loops, variables, and more.

  • A hint system that pushes you in the right direction in case you are stuck on a quest.

name: FemQuest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: FemQuest is a playful approach to get girls and young women interested in programming. Develop solutions for block-based programming puzzles to help save the town, alone or with friends!
